review: Had to send it back. Disappointing product. Could not watch anything with it. Connection kept dropping, Movie kept buffering to the point it could not be watched. Also, when there was a picture, it was not anywhere close to HD quality.
author: sch48

review: Works great..can finally watch Netflix without buffering.  Wish we had bought this sooner
author: nick's dad "undercats"

review: Great!!!!!! Easy install and now I can watch anything anytime!!! B
author: Dawn Habermann

review: After purchasing the Fire Stick, Dish has Netflix available through their Hopper.  I really don't need the fire stick any longer
author: Sharrie Singmaster "sking0023"

review: I always read reviews before I purchase an item, and I was not disappointed with my fire TV stick. Works very well, syncs with my Fire Tablet, and does everything our Roku & Chrome stick do as well. We will be buying another Fire TV Stick before the end of the year! I highly recommend this item!!!
author: tami danielson

review: I like my fire stick it helps me keep the cost of my cable bill down.
author: patrick raymond
